trans-unit.source: Indicates the **Server Explorer** node that is being extended, or specifies the ID of a new **Server Explorer** node that is being defined.
trans-unit.target: 指示正在扩展的“服务器资源管理器”节点或指定正在定义的新“服务器资源管理器”节点的 ID。

trans-unit.source: When you apply this attribute to a class that implements the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeExtension> interface, it indicates the **Server Explorer** node that is being extended.
trans-unit.target: 当你将此特性应用于实现的类<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeExtension>接口，它指示**服务器资源管理器**正在扩展的节点。

trans-unit.source: When you apply this attribute to a class that implements the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeProvider> interface, it specifies the ID for the new node.
trans-unit.target: 当你将此特性应用于实现的类<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeProvider>接口，它指定新节点的 ID。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Extend a SharePoint Node in Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md) and [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 扩展服务器资源管理器中的 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-extend-a-sharepoint-node-in-server-explorer.md)和[如何： 向服务器资源管理器中添加自定义 SharePoint 节点](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer.md)。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the node that is being extended or defined.
trans-unit.target: 正在扩展或定义的节点的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypeAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypeAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: To specify a built-in node, use one of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypes> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes> values.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的内置节点，请使用之一<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.ExplorerNodeTypes>或<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.Extensions.ExtensionNodeTypes>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the node that is being extended or defined.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在扩展或定义的节点的 ID。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the node that is being extended or defined.
trans-unit.target: 正在节点的 ID 扩展或定义。
